name: The Roll of Destiny 2
description:
This prototype was made for the GMTK Game Jam whose theme was Roll of the Dice . We wanted to experiment with the concept of randomness where each of your actions are not determined by your choice but by the chaotic nature of the dice. Keep in mind that the actions are not predetermined, but only and simply determined.

JC : 2D artist and game designer

OliRobi: Music and special effects composer, game and level designer.
